page.title: 05RETIRING IN UPPER HARTFIELD
page.content: Here, retirement can be relaxed or hectic. If huntin',shootin' and fishin' are not favourite pastimes, the many clubs and groups nearby maybe. There is the British Legion Women's Section, Hartfield Sports Association, covering cricket to croquet and the sociable Good Companions.There is the Horticultural Society with Summer Show, Barn Dance and Autumn Show; the Hartfield Singers; the Art Group or the Twits Drama group. There is always something to discover at the History Group and the Women's Institute do much more than just jam making! Charity work can be varied - Children's Societies, Red Cross and Cancer Research. All this, or just walking and looking at the beauty of the Forest.
